questions.title: 我很高兴带你参观我的公司。
questions.answer: I'm glad to show you around my company.

questions.title: 只要你愿意，我很高兴为你做任何事。
questions.answer: If you'd like, I'm happy to do everything for you.

questions.title: 当遇到困难时，我很高兴你没有放弃我们的梦想。
questions.answer: I'm glad that you didn't give up our dreams when we were in trouble.

questions.title: 我很高兴地告诉你，你已经被我们学院录取了。
questions.answer: I'm happy to inform you that you have got admitted to our college.

questions.title: 我很高兴帮助你。
questions.answer: I could be pleased to help you.

answer.en: Sorry to have troubled you to show me the way.

title: ——无论发生什么我都很高兴和你一起面对。
——谢谢你陪在我身边。

answer.en: No matter what happens I'm pleased to face it with you.
Thank you for your staying by my side.

title: ——史密斯先生，您的客人来了，在会议室等你。
——你好比尔，很高兴见到你。
——我也很高兴见到你。

answer.en: Mr. Smith, your guest is coming, he is in meeting room.
Hi Bill！I'm happy to meet you.
I'm happy to meet you too.
